general.description: A bastion of civilization on the edge of Dvaered space, New Eris is one of the few worlds in this region that isn't uninhabitable, scarred by heavy industry, or both. As such, this world is often the crown jewl of any Warlord who rules in this area.
general.bar: Despite being on the fringe of Dvaered space, the inhabitants of New Eris keep up with all the social trends in the core. The spaceport bar, always a popular recreational stop for local youngsters, is a fine display of Dvaered fasion. If you like that sort of thing.
